definitions.definition: Husband of Cassiopeia , king of Eritrea , father of Andromeda . There may be two mythical kings by this name.
A circumpolar constellation of the northern sky, located between Draco and Cassiopeia and representing the king Cepheus from Greek myth. It contains the star Alderamin .

main_definition: ( Greek mythology ) Husband of Cassiopeia , king of Eritrea , father of Andromeda . There may be two mythical kings by this name.
secondary_definitions: ( astronomy ) A circumpolar constellation of the northern sky, located between Draco and Cassiopeia and representing the king Cepheus from Greek myth. It contains the star Alderamin .
